query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_floor_plans (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  building_name VARCHAR(100),
  floor_number INT DEFAULT 1,
  image_url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  image_width INT NOT NULL,
  image_height INT NOT NULL,
  scale_meters_per_pixel DECIMAL(10,6),
  origin_x INT DEFAULT 0,
  origin_y INT DEFAULT 0,
  rotation INT DEFAULT 0,
  metadata JSON,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  sort_order INT DEFAULT 0,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_floor_plan_building (building_name),
  INDEX idx_floor_plan_active (is_active)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_floor_plans (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  building_name VARCHAR(100),
  floor_number INT DEFAULT 1,
  image_url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  image_width INT NOT NULL,
  image_height INT NOT NULL,
  scale_meters_per_pixel DECIMAL(10,6),
  origin_x INT DEFAULT 0,
  origin_y INT DEFAULT 0,
  rotation INT DEFAULT 0,
  metadata JSON,
  is_active INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  sort_order INT DEFAULT 0,
  created_by INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_floor_plan_building (building_name),
  INDEX idx_floor_plan_active (is_active)
);
